list.description:
Hi guys, i just want to share my Sim sight for the C1 Ariete for the APFSDS. It isnt a beauty but it works.

This thing is still work in progress and i wouldnt say it is to to acurate but its still better than learning the paralax.

The First marking is 20 Meters but at ranges this close you realy shouldnt shoot in the sight.

Have a good one !

Mentions: I thank SMILY4 for the nice custom sight editor with out his work i wont be able to make this sight.
and Minedeployder for the Tipp with the arcade testdrive!

#ariete #sight #sim #arietec1 #simulator

Schindibee's fictional missile sight for Swingfire

#customsight #sight #fictional #swingfire #missile #atgm #fv438_swingfire #fv102_striker #striker

This is a fully fictional sight for the FV438 Swingfire and FV102 Striker (UK missile tank destroyers):

The sight features a simple crosshair with a basic stadiametric rangefinder (helpful to quickly estimate distance to target) in the form of vertical lines: The lines have the height of a typical tank (2.5 meters) at a certain distance (400, 800, 1600 and 3200 meters) and are positioned so thec can measure the tank's hulls (7 meters). As an ex
Box-circle sight for any vehicle. Once again, has a variant with range marks.

Schindibee's fictional sight for 35mm KDA armed SPAA

#customsight #sight #fictional #gepard #flakpz_i #type_87 #marksman #chieftain_marksman

RE-UPLAD FIXING BUG WITH MARKSMAN

This is a fully fictional sight for the three SPAA armed with the 35mm KDA canons, the German Gepard, Japanese Type 87, and British Marksman. The sight feature a simple aiming pattern for usage with radar, and a very basic but functional ballistics scales for use without radar or against ground targets.

Note that the three vehicles have very different optics, and the sights are optimized for zoomed-in operation: Espec

No longer needed, original got updated, link below

OTOMATIC Sim sight

You probably know how bad I am at doing things all by myself but I like adjusting things of others for myself :D. So here we are again: the OTOMATIC has a quite "difficult" sight position in SB. Since there was no sight out there I made one myself.
>>does 6-10 really mean 600-1000m?< Yes, due to the sight position, the low drop of the APFSDS and the inaccruracy of the gun, all shots at those ranges land in about the same position.
>>is this only for APFSDS or also for SAP and HE?< currently it´s only for the APFSDS, since

Update (2): The middle dots go now up to 3000m

Update (1): Added 7m and 8m funnel. I recommend redownloading as you'd want to use the 7m or 8m funnel in high BR matches.

Since I haven't found any good sight for the AUBL/74, I decided to make one.

Credit to Schindibee for the Anax funnel that I took from his Breda 501 sight and changed it a bit for this tank: https://live.warthunder.com/user/Schindibee/

Installation:

  • Copy the "it_fiat_6616_cockerill" file in WarThunder/UserSights/

#aubl_74 #aubl74 #aubl #cockerill #90mm #customsight #customsights #fictional #fiat6616 #fiat_6616 #fiat_6616

My first attempt at a sight so any tips would be helpful basically a really simple distance sight for the RBT-5 rockets, i use it mainly on arcade and use it to spam cap points with rocket goodness.

Different distances depending on mode:
normal sight:
.arcade/realistic max 250

Gunner sight view:
Arcade 250-500
Realistic 250-400 (500 if you can get the sights angled right)

also suggest setting keys to sight distance as well as mouse wheel or you will be scrolling for days

Update for some reason at max range rockets have decided that they veer left at 400 out
#rbt5 #rockets #c...

İ downloaded random sights and i combined them and create BfBc2 T-90 sight for T-55-AM

#t55am #t-55 #am #t55am1 #battlefield #badcompany2 #Bad #company #bfbc2

The most Sophisticated SPAA sight ever made for the R3 T20 FA-HS and a bonus of Universal sights.

Update (3): Fixed size of text due to patch 1.95. Also, they changed the sight size back to normal again. So this sight is useful again.

Update (2): Fixed highlighting text at night.

Update: Added Universal_Sight_V4_1 (has 1 more ring at 96 mils radius)

The sight is a work in progress. Table 4 is based on in-game measurements instead of formulas. I'm working on the math and simulating the actual bullet for the 20 mm Oerlikon cannon in SimScale (need to find the drag coefficient at different sp

This is just a simple sight, nothing historical. I made it for myself, but thought I'd share it with y'all.
I brought the digits next to the main vertical line, placed them on both sides, and expanded it to 5km to be able to shoot at helis.
I have also attached a different sight (sight_3), which has the digits more sparsely placed for high velocity and/or poor zoom guns. (Like the Abrams', or the Tiger II (early).)

#sight #sights #customsight #custom_sights

MOSTLY OUTDATED AND I WILL NOT BE UPDATING THEM ANYMORE

I'm also disabling the comments since I'm really not coming back to updating them, if you want to download something that actually works then check for example sights made by Rastmust
https://live.warthunder.com/user/107154207/
...
Memorial for my old sights

Schindibee's fictional sight for Semovente Breda 501

#customsight #sight #fictional #breda501 #breda_501

This is a fully fictional sight for the Italian Breda 501 Tank Destroyer, based on the funnel-type "Anax" sight I have created for a few vehicles already.

The sight features quick-use features like main graduation, ranging funnel and deflection aiming aids for the improved APCBC ammo and distance scales for the weaker default APCBC and HE ammos.

Installation:

1) Copy contained folder \UserSights\ into your main WT-folder \War Thunder\.

2) Go to test Drive (reccommended anyway to try o

#customsight #sight #fictional #vfw #versuchsflakwagen

This is a fully fictional sight for the VFW, based on the funnel-type "Anax" sight I have created for a few vehicles already.

#2s6_tunguska #2s6 #tunguska #sight #toptier #spaa

Minimalistic arcade sight, from which I removed all unnecessary for the arcade (and maybe someone in realistic like it)

Additional
The sight is available in 3 versions with scales up to 1.2 km (S), 2.8 km (M), 6 km (L).

Installation


  1. Download archive to any folder
  2. Pull out the sights (.blk) to the folder with the scopes need the tank, in the folder "UserSights" in the root folder of the game (if not, then create with same name) (if the folder "UserSights" no need a folder with the sights of the tank, then the actions described in item 4, with one exception, select the item "Add a grid sight",

Sight for ZSU-57-2 for a view from the gunner with marks of a trajectory for two guns (at a distance to 100 meters inclusive)

Additionally

  • Also suggest to read the article "the Calculation of distance (ru)".
  • "FG_P" in sight-name is "From Gunner _ Points"

Installation

  1. Download the archive to any folder
  2. Pull out the folder "ussr_zsu_57_2" in the folder "UserSights" in the root folder of the game (if not, then create with the same name)
  3. Go to the game client
  4. Choose the right technique
  5. Go to "Options" - > "Main parameters" - > "Common Battle Settings" - > "Use alternative sight grid" - > Select
